name: .VIDEOMELD File Extension
summary: Learn about .VIDEOMELD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A VIDEOMELD file is a project created by GoldWave VideoMeld, a Windows video editor. It contains information about a project in the XML-like VideoMeld format, which includes the placement of media and effects on the timeline and project properties, such as video aspect ratio, speed, and audio levels. VIDEOMELD files do not store multimedia imported into the project; instead, they contain references to the media files a project includes.

content: VideoMeld provides various features for editing video, audio, images, and effects into presentations, tutorials, home videos, and training videos. It comes with transitions, overlays, text captions, and compositing capabilities.

For example, you can import videos and images from your vacation into a VIDEOMELD project, and then apply audio and effects to it to create a video presentation. After finishing the project, you can export it to a video file type or publish it to YouTube or Vimeo.

instructions: You can open VIDEOMELD files with GoldWave VideoMeld in Windows. To open a VIDEOMELD file with the video editor, select File â†’ Open Project.

Since VIDEOMELD files store plain text you can open them with a text editor. For example, you can use Microsoft Notepad (Windows) or Apple TextEdit (macOS) to open the files (you may need to change the .videomeld file extension to .txt for the text editor to recognize and open the file).
Remember that modifying a VIDEOMELD file with a text editor may cause it to become corrupt.
GoldWave VideoMeld can convert VIDEOMELD files to various formats, including:
